website_summaries.verdict: Contrast stitching gives these water-friendly sandals a touch of style.

customer_reviews.title: Check the price
customer_reviews.text: The sandals themselves are great... however, very unhappy that for the first time ever I purchased something for $50 that cost $38 on the Nike Website. I normally am very please with my amazon purchases but this was a fail and I’m at a loss of almost $20. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Velcro ripped.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give 0 stars. The Velcro ripped the very first time my son wore them! We had to change his shoes before we had even left the house.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Merryman

customer_reviews.title: Ok, these are AMAZING.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, these are AMAZING. They seem super comfortable and are the only shoes my son actually keeps on. They look stylish and sporty and fit him great. He wears a 4.5 but we got him a size 5 and they are perfect. I would recommend these to any parent looking for a summer, comfy Shoe that isn’t exactly a sandal but allows the foot to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: mitzy

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Fits perfectly - I was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits perfectly - I was a little worried it will be too small.. Very light weight and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Adi Sapir

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and stylish for boy or girl!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves these! They are super light weight and easy to put on and take off...a definite MUST for squirmy toddlers! The whole top portion can be opened via velcro on both sides to slide a foot in very easy. Worth the extra $ for the lightness and design compared to a few other types of toddler footwear. The only questionable thing was it arrived in a clear cheapo crinkley plastic bag, not in a shoe box of its own. I thought it might have been a knock off but it was the real deal (thank goodness!) I am considering buying this again as it seems a good fit for my son as his feet grow.
customer_reviews.author: dantes_paradise

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: I get these every summer for my grandchildren They are ideal for outside water playground play activities with the protection on the toes its a great cool stylish sandal
customer_reviews.author: Quiana Jones

customer_reviews.title: BEST toddler sandal out there!!
customer_reviews.text: We love love love this sandal! Our little guy had the same pair in a size smaller but we (and he) liked them so much when he grew out of first pair we ordered a second! They are easy to put on! My little has wide feet so most shoes/sandals are hard to put on but these are great! They stay on through any activity! He wore them to the park, to the splash pad even to the great wolf lodge water park this summer! They do give pretty much tan lines from the little dots but we found it adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler & Cassie

customer_reviews.title: no blisters and the Velcro on both sides makes it easy to take them off and put them on
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be buying these in different sizes as my son grows. He is a go go go kid and always into something. Never had any complaints about his feet, no blisters and the Velcro on both sides makes it easy to take them off and put them on
customer_reviews.author: Daniek

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: These are not like normal nike's that run really small. Get your normal size! They are perfect for summer and we get many compliments and others asking where we purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: DMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great summer shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son lives in these in the summer. They fit great and don't hurt his feet. This is our second summer buying this brand and we love them. Easy to get on and off, lightweight, and toddler friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Chatfield

customer_reviews.title: If you have a toddler purchase these
customer_reviews.text: I brought these sandals for my 2 year old son and he walks around in them very good and they fit him perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ewania Veres

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite sandals for our toddler. He used them a ton last summer so we decided to buy him another pair for this summer. They look nice, appear to be comfortable and can be warm in the water or as normal sandals
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I’ve bought my son (one in each size as he’s grown) and I will for sure be buying them again in the next size. These are perfect for florida toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi W.

customer_reviews.title: Worst shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Worst schoes ever. It scratched my daughter delicate skin on feet. I bought it because shoes had a good reviews. Highly not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Patrycja

customer_reviews.title: Slips off
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are horrible. They fit him but slip right off. The back strap does not keep the shoe on like it should
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Picture speaks itself. Just within 2 months of a non frequent use (it is not that hot in new england during summer) the toe of the sandals are just torn out! Very poor quality and would never buy again this product!
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Will never buy a Nike product ever again. Do not support either their corporate policies or decisions especially from those I strongly oppose.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect closed toed sandal for my 6 y.o.! He loves them and I get asked a lot where I got them. They are a bit big but my sons feet grow so fast!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great, Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are for my 2 year old and I bought him a pair last year too. Comfortable for him and he like to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my sons 4th pair of these sandals, as his feet grows I go up a size with this sandal...they are light weight, easy to put on, stylish, and convenient and great for the beach and ideal for the summer time...I love this sandal and I will be buying more in the upcoming years....I highly and truly recommend this shoe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laticia

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: These are true to size. One of the Nike signs was faded off and they are slightly overpriced much for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lakisha Perkins-Lu

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! I love them. My toddler looks so fancy :) easy to use, easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected and love!
customer_reviews.text: These shows are great for my 2 year old son! He wears them outside, mud, running, and pool!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 they’re so good
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect summer shoes for a little one. They’re lightweight, dry fast, protect the toe, easy to put on. I’ve bought 3 pairs so that my kid can keep wearing them every time he grows out of a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight shoes
customer_reviews.text: They’re so lightweight with enough support and grip. Great for my toddler to run around in without tripping. They’re so cute and will work great for the summer! My toddler loves them and seems comfortable on him!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: my son is in a 10 for shoes and these are a 10 and fit him good so I feel they are true to size. they are holding up pretty good for a 4 year old boy on the go:)
customer_reviews.author: christine R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sandal/sneaker hybrid
customer_reviews.text: My son doesn’t like flip flops but wants sandals for the summer that don’t fall off and these are perfect for him!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.text: These have a little arch for toddlers foot easy on and easy off Velcro
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler sandal
customer_reviews.text: Great summer shoe for toddlers here in Miami, Fl. Easy to wash as well, dry quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you can hold up my kids it's a good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are the shoes I'm buying for my kids every summer
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair we have bought for our son (out grew the first pair) They are super durable and easy to put on. He loves them too, which is a huge bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Brittin Pollack

customer_reviews.title: The security tag was still attached.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with the security tag still attached. I decided to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Liz E Mendez

customer_reviews.title: So angry
customer_reviews.text: I am so mad I pay more than $50 for this sandal and when it reach it is for new born I don’t even know wat size it is but am sure it isn’t size 10 or for any three years old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: As you can see in my pictures I had a terrible experience with this the theft proof thing was still on it and both do the backs looked like they were burned I am not happy at all it’s not true to size because they were a little tight on my son come on Amazon I need a free pair now after this experience!
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad hassan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied. These sandals are awesome. My son loves them and they are holding up very well compared to his activites ! Would definitely recommend. Not to mention they are really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Ussery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes for my son all summer. Can be worn in the water and out of the water. He loves them and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: K Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Ccute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but as always with Nike they run a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love Nike, could have got them cheaper, but I only trust Amazon to deliver. And may I add they are very light weight
customer_reviews.author: Eugeniajackson

customer_reviews.title: Nike
customer_reviews.text: Not the best looking Nike Sandal, but it will due.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sandals, quick and easy for the kids to put on themselves. Not the best for running a lot as is true with any sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Mason L.

customer_reviews.title: poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: This item cam with two different sizes in the box as well as 2 left foot.. i have been trying to call for an exchange and haven't been able to reach anyone.
customer_reviews.author: G.W

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Liked these very much, a gift for my Great Grandson!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K Staniger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toddler shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoe are amazing for summer days, the sole isn't fabric, which makes it perfect for summer, waterparks beach walking ect... because they dry super fast! No more soggy shoe for your toddler. We absolutely love these. Would most definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Martens

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome for toddlers! My 1 year old can walk in them with ease and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Oftedahl

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: My son wore these non stop. Really like them and wish I bought bigger so he would stay in them longer. Worn through the rain mud everything and they have had a lot of use and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Holly s.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer sandal!
customer_reviews.text: Strap them on and go! I will buy these every year because I'm a mom on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My third or fourth time buying the same shoes the are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: veselin minkov

customer_reviews.title: Price, and quick delivery for a great product by Nike
customer_reviews.text: Great article available on Amazon even better, fits perfect for my 2 year baby boy.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Chinas

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get on and off. But also stays on feet well. A good alternative to flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan D.

customer_reviews.title: Sport them with socks like grandpa
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and light weight. Shipped fast! My sons loves these sandals. He can where them near the pool or to the park with socks on like grandpa.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: 5 starts
customer_reviews.text: So cute and comfy for my son! They are very lightweight and fit perfectly :) love them
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like these as much as last years style- but they still adjust as needed so he can wear them all summer long
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: I love them but they seemed bigger than expected but that’s ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them but they seemed bigger than expected but that’s a good thing since I have a growing boy
customer_reviews.author: Ritah Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and my LO wears them sometimes all day. We have gotten lots of compliments on them. Wish they would fit him longer. Will be buying a bigger size for him. He wears them in and out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: KKH

customer_reviews.title: Side rubbing.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit well, but the sides by the ankle rubbed my sons foot raw. Tossed them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Product worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his shoes. He can put them on himself, no problem. He dumped all his other three pairs for this one pair.
customer_reviews.author: T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sandal with rubber on bottom which is great
customer_reviews.text: Loves his sandals. Comfortable sandal with rubber on bottom which is great!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: These fit great!
customer_reviews.text: My son has very chubby/wife feet, I couldn't find any sandals to fit him! These fit great!
customer_reviews.author: CRM

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Love them ! Sorry he’s outgrowing them so soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These summer shoes are the best for kids. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is really easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is really easy on and off. However it’s a little bit big than 13cm. The overall is good.
customer_reviews.author: Chen Hue Tzu

customer_reviews.title: I get the exact thing I want but was too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small I did have to return it but it’s a nice sandal for my baby
customer_reviews.author: Ashana

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for school
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoes. He was able to wear them to school. I plan on buying more as his feet grow
customer_reviews.author: Amkarwazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are adorable on his little feet! He was so excited when I showed him
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Daniel Wells

customer_reviews.title: They were really cute but didnt work well for my ...
customer_reviews.text: They were really cute but didnt work well for my son, his feet are too wide I wish Nike would start making wide widths for all there shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Mary G.

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler shoes ever.
customer_reviews.text: We get so many compliments on these, they're adorable and most importantly they stay on my kids feet! They have velcro sides and it makes them really easy to get in and off, no fighting with the heels and trying to get them in. Originally bought them as water shoes for vacation but we use them now as every day shoes because of how convenient they are. I'll be sad when he outgrows them!
customer_reviews.author: April

product_meta.title: Nike Kids' Sunray Protect (Infant/Toddler)
product_meta.description: Phylon midsole for superior cushioningMolded outsole for enhanced traction .
